Posts.Content: Thankyou Rationally I know this is the case but can't shake off the "downness "
Posts.Title: Down

Posts.Content: Diagnosed in August and had WLE and sentinel node removal on 8th September Saw my most amazing surgeon 9 days later to be told I had pre cancerous cells in the margins and another op required. she suggested a reduction ,as I was Grade 1 with no other spread and as I have big boobs had the op on 22 nd September so 2 anaesthetics in 2 weeks Saw my surgeon today and everything clear and my scar has healed already Not without some pain,sleepless nights and worry. i should feel good but instead I feel really low

Posts.Content: Thank you all Your kind thoughts are really helpful
